data.text: @rum1n8 @PH11122 @redsteeze My bad. Still not required by CDC guidelines but somewhat more reasonable if they were wearing N95s.
@rum1n8 @PH11122 @redsteeze Well there is no real point in wearing masks outdoors period unless there are really high covid rates in your area hence the changed CDC guidelines.

@Apple__Power @PH11122 @redsteeze Correct: DeSantis was wrong. 
He also wasn't trying to get them to wear better masks, so no points there. 
The N95-equipped student is the best protected and the others wearing cloth masks are less protected.
Hopefully they'll optimize their mask choice in the future.
@rum1n8 @PH11122 @redsteeze And that's for indoor masking let alone outdoors.

@rum1n8 @PH11122 @redsteeze It's not that it doesn't help, thats obviously a little hyperbolic. It just doesn't help that much and given the current COVID rates, we don't really need them in post places anymore. If you are trying to be serious wear an N95. https://t.co/M2IqlIZUB6
@rum1n8 @PH11122 @redsteeze Only one of them was wearing an n95. https://t.co/wBfxnSanKG
